item.title: Late Autumn/Mild Winter v5.5 ETS2
item.description:
Late Autumn/Mild Winter v5.5 ETS2

This is a graphics and weather mod that simulates a late autumn/mild winter environment and transforms older parts of the map with newer high resolution graphics.

Features
Roads, fields, grass, terrain, sidewalks, kerbs, hedges, railings, treewalls and other textures replaced with higher resolution versions
Low resolution tree models replaced by high resolution ones across maps
Grass improvements
Increased grass density
Improved road textures
Random grey sky, foggy and sunny weather
Improved rain
Leafless vegetation
Late Autumn/Mild Winter daylight hours
Appropriate temperature readings

Compatibility latest version: ETS2 1.50

Works with Promods and many other maps.
Compatible with all map DLCs.

Changes in 5.5
Updated for 1.50

Recommended settings
Vegetation Detail: High
Grass Density: High

Important!!
Late Autumn/Mild Winter is a weather and graphics mod so other graphics, weather and HDR mods should be disabled to avoid conflicts, issues and crashes.
If you are using Next-Gen only use the base part of that mod.
If you are using RBGW place this mod below it
Late Autumn/Mild Winter should be given a HIGH priority in Mod Manager.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Old Range-T E-Tech Steering Wheel Add-on v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Old Range-T E-Tech Steering Wheel Add-on v1.0 ETS2

Changes
– Added support Gloover’s Range T

Old Range-T “E-Tech” Steering Wheel Add-on
This mod adds the new “E-Tech” steering wheel to Renault Range-T truck.

– Red color added.

item.title: Improved Renault E-Tech v1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Improved Renault E-Tech v1.2 ETS2

Changes 1.2
– Fixed game crash and long loading screen
– Added red color option for steering wheel
– Fixed paint_job flake UV

This mod extra customization for newly added “Renault E-Tech” truck in the game.

Includes:
– Ownable (Mod Dealer)
– Long Range option added. (Modified Batterys) (Chassis)
– High Sleeper cabin added.
– Skin support added. (Old Renault- T, Evo Skins)
– MP engine sound remote fixed.
– Door Step added. (Standard- Serpent)
– Door Handle added. (Paint- Chrome)
– Mirror added. (Gray- Paint- Chrome)
– Old Sideskirts added.
– Old Steering Wheel added.
– Old Engine Badge added. (Diesel)
– Bull Bar (f_grill) added.
– Lower Grille Guard (b_grill) added.
– Light Bar (r_grill) added.
– Left Horn (l_horn) added.
– Right Horn (r_horn) added.
– Beacon added.
– Sun Visor added.
– All parts converted Sleeper cab.
– Cabin Accessories DLC support added.
– T Tuning pack DLC support fixed. (all parts to E- Tech)
– Front E- Tech Badge (f_badge) converted High Sleeper cab.
– Corner Deflectors (cor_def) added.
– Side Deflectors (s_deflector) added.
– Roof Deflectors (r_deflector) added.
– Cabin Trim (f_cab_trim) added.
– Door Trim (doortrim) added.
– Window Trim (windowtrim) added.
– Stoneguard (s_guard) added.
– Headlight Guard (hl_guard) added.
– New Bull Bars (f_grill) added.
– New Light Bars (r_grill) added.
– New Low Griller Guards (b_grill) added.
– Front Mudflaps (f_mudflap) added.
– Rear Mudflaps (r_mudflap) added.
– Rear Bumper (r_bumper) added.
– Front Fender (r_fender_cab) added.
– Rear Fender (r_fender) added.
– Rear Fender Top (r_fendr_top) added.
– Sideskirts Bars (sideskrt_bar) added.
– Left Windows Flag (flag_l) added.
– Right Windows Flag (flag_r) added.
– Driver’s Plate (drv_plate) added.
– CoDriver’s Plate (codrv_plate) added.
– Side Stripe (s_strip) added.

DLC Supports;
– Cabin Accessories DLC support added.
– T Tuning pack DLC support added.
– HS Schoch Tuning Pack DLC support added.
– Metallic Paint jobs DLC support added.
– Flip Paint Designs DLC support added.
– Valentine Metallic Paint job DLC support added.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Kasumi Knight Costume Skin For Jasper DAF 2021 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Kasumi Knight Costume Skin For Jasper DAF 2021 v1.0 ETS2

Hello again, finally i can fully recover from sickness and i can make a livery again so i decide choose jasper daf 2021 for this comeback because i don’t make livery for this truck for hell long time also fix some error from previous livery. Anyway enjoy the mod

Details:
– XG+ Cab Only
– All Chassis Support
– All Custom Part Support & Utility(No Texture Error)
